summary: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.
cast: Jennifer Carpenter|Steve Harris|Jay Hernandez|Johnathon Schaech|Columbus Short|Andrew Fiscella|Rade Serbedzija|Greg Germann|Bernard White|Dania Ramirez|Elaine Kagan|Marin Hinkle|Joey King|Jermaine Jackson|Sharon Ferguson|Denis O'Hare|Stacy Chbosky|Jeannie Epper|Barry Sigismondi|Rosine 'Ace' Hatem|Christian Svensson|Scott Donovan|Michael Potter|Jane Park Smith|Craig Susser|Bert Jernigan|Doug Jones|John Meier|Troy Gilbert|Shawn Driscoll|Bryan Ross|Robert Hall|Benjamin Stockham|Michael Hyland|Ben Messmer|Mike Strong|Joe Fria|Josh Polizzi
title: Quarantine
